snippet.title: Pop'n'splat Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Microsoft Store:
https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9PGW0TLSCR28

Available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1082940/Popnsplat/

Pop'n'splat is an arcade bubble shooter that requires careful planning for puzzle levels, and some fast reflexes for time and infinite modes. Matching music and cartoon sound effects complete this fun and challenging game.
